item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Reveal Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has revealed a nuanced picture across Indian equities, with 3,658 companies reporting results. While the overall proportion of positive earnings outcomes has inched up to 46.0%, mid-cap stocks continue to outperform their large- and small-cap counterparts, signalling a shift in market dynamics amid ongoing economic challenges. Time: 6 minutes ago

item.title: Pritish Nandy Communications Gains 1.61%: 2 Key Events Shaping the Week
item.description: Pritish Nandy Communications Ltd recorded a modest weekly gain of 1.61%, closing at Rs.27.13 on 13 Feb 2026, outperforming the Sensex which declined by 0.54% over the same period. The stock’s performance was marked by volatility midweek, culminating in a strong rebound on Friday following the release of its Q4 2025 financial results that revealed a remarkable turnaround. However, the week also saw a sharp sell-off triggered by a massive loss reported for Q3 FY26, reflecting mixed investor sentiment amid operational challenges. Time: 46 minutes ago

item.title: Baba Arts Ltd Gains 27.28%: Technical Stabilisation Amid Fundamental Challenges
item.description: Baba Arts Ltd delivered a remarkable weekly gain of 27.28%, closing at Rs.10.87 on 13 Feb 2026, significantly outperforming the Sensex which declined by 0.54% over the same period. This surge was driven primarily by a technical upgrade and stabilising price momentum despite persistent fundamental weaknesses and elevated valuation concerns. The week saw steady daily price advances, culminating in strong volume spikes on the final trading days, reflecting heightened market activity and investor attention. Time: 46 minutes ago

item.title: Global Capital Markets Ltd Gains 1.89%: 4 Key Factors Driving the Week
item.description: Global Capital Markets Ltd recorded a modest weekly gain of 1.89%, closing at Rs.0.54 on 13 February 2026, outperforming the Sensex which declined by 0.54% over the same period. item.title: Goodluck India Ltd Falls 5.64%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline

item.title: Trident Ltd Falls 3.54%: Margin Pressures and Valuation Shift Shape Weekly Trend
item.description: Trident Ltd’s stock declined by 3.54% over the week ending 13 February 2026, closing at Rs.26.70 from Rs.27.68, underperforming the Sensex which fell 0.54%. The week was marked by significant margin pressures revealed in Q3 FY26 results, a downgrade in mojo grade to Sell, and a shift in valuation from attractive to fair, all contributing to subdued investor sentiment despite some short-term resilience in price movements. Time: 47 minutes ago

item.title: Krishanveer Forge Ltd Declines 1.83%: Valuation Shifts and Margin Expansion Shape Week
item.description: Krishanveer Forge Ltd closed the week ending 13 February 2026 at Rs.131.50, down 1.83% from the previous Friday’s close of Rs.133.95. item.title: Engineers India Ltd Gains 17.80%: 5 Key Factors Driving the Surge
item.description: Engineers India Ltd delivered a remarkable weekly performance from 9 to 13 February 2026, surging 17.80% from Rs.171.35 to Rs.201.85, significantly outperforming the Sensex which declined 0.54% over the same period. item.title: Shukra Jewellery Falls 4.42%: Financial Struggles and Bearish Signals Weigh on Stock
item.description: Shukra Jewellery Ltd’s stock declined by 4.42% over the week ending 13 February 2026, closing at Rs.7.35 from Rs.7.69. This underperformance contrasted with the Sensex’s modest 0.54% fall, reflecting investor concerns following disappointing quarterly results and a downgrade to a strong sell rating by MarketsMOJO. The week was marked by persistent revenue volatility and deteriorating financial and technical indicators, which weighed heavily on the stock’s performance. Time: 47 minutes ago

item.title: Royal India Corporation Gains 0.63%: 2 Key Factors Driving the Week
item.description: Royal India Corporation Ltd closed the week with a modest gain of 0.63%, rising from Rs.6.33 to Rs.6.37 between 09 and 13 February 2026, marginally outperforming the Sensex which declined by 0.54% over the same period. The week was marked by a significant downgrade to a Strong Sell rating amid deteriorating fundamentals and bearish technicals, followed by a sharp revenue collapse in the company’s Q3 FY26 results, which weighed on investor sentiment and contributed to volatile price movements. item.title: Picturehouse Media Ltd’s 0.85% Weekly Decline: Flat Quarterly Performance and Margin Pressures Weigh
item.description: Picturehouse Media Ltd’s stock declined by 0.85% over the week ending 13 February 2026, closing at Rs.7.04 from Rs.7.10 the previous Friday. This underperformance contrasted with the Sensex’s smaller 0.54% fall, reflecting investor caution amid flat quarterly results and margin pressures reported midweek. Despite a brief intraday recovery, the stock struggled to sustain gains as concerns over revenue stagnation and reliance on non-operating income weighed on sentiment. Time: 47 minutes ago

item.title: Dredging Corporation of India Ltd’s 1.70% Weekly Decline: Quality Concerns and Mixed Technical Signals Shape the Week
item.description: Dredging Corporation of India Ltd (DCI) experienced a challenging week from 9 to 13 February 2026, with its stock price declining by 1.70% to close at ₹967.60, underperforming the Sensex which fell 0.54% over the same period. The week was marked by a downgrade to a Sell rating amid deteriorating quality metrics, mixed technical signals, and volatile price movements. item.title: The Ramco Cements Ltd Dips 1.31% Despite New Highs: 3 Key Factors Shaping the Week
item.description: The Ramco Cements Ltd experienced a mixed week from 9 to 13 February 2026, opening at Rs.1,203.65 on Monday and closing at Rs.1,145.00 on Friday, marking a weekly decline of 1.31%. This underperformance contrasted with the Sensex’s smaller drop of 0.54% over the same period. The stock’s early surge to a new 52-week and all-time high on 9 February was followed by a series of declines amid rising volumes and margin pressures, reflecting a complex interplay of positive milestones and emerging cautionary signals. Time: 48 minutes ago
